page.title: 03Square 2
page.content: This is the major section of the Village. There are approximately {30} Houses, and it ammenities include a{ {Post Office}which doubles as a{General {Store.}It also has a{Church}with a{ {Cemetery,}a{Primary School,}a{Village {Hall}and{Boat repair and maintenance {yard. { }This square is the only square within the block which has a regular bus service to{Chester}(the major conurbation in the region) and back. The land in this square is all privately owned by the{Westminster {Estate. { {Attitudes.}There is little or no{ {Unemployment}in the village and over half of those in work, work on the {Estate.}Most of the inhabitants are content with there lives, and would welcome little change.
